name: Captain Needa
Lore: 'Able leader and captain of the Avenger. Was given his command by Admiral Ozzel. Treated with suspicion by Darth Vader and the Emperor, who distrust Ozzel''s close advisors.',
Text: 'Adds 2 to power of anything he pilots. When piloting Avenger, that starship is also immune to attrition < 4. You may re-target applicable Utinni Effects to Needa. If in a battle where you choose to forfeit characters, you must forfeit Needa first.',
